name: ogarii
description: FOSS implementation of a private Agar.io gameserver

scripts.start: node -e "const isGlitch = process.env.GLITCH_PROJECT_NAME !== undefined; const isReplit = process.env.REPL_ID !== undefined; if (isGlitch) { console.log('Running on Glitch'); require('child_process').execSync('node index.js', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } else if (isReplit) { console.log('Running on Replit'); require('child_process').execSync('cd cli && node index.js', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } else { console.log('Running on another platform'); }"
